### Epic Description
A clear and concise description of what the epic is and its overall goal.

### Related User Stories and Tasks
- [ ] Story 1 (#issue-number)
- [ ] Task 1 (#issue-number)
- [ ] Story 2 (#issue-number)

### Objective
What this epic aims to achieve at a high level.

### Additional Context
Add any other context or links to resources that help clarify the epic.
